text: Genuri (Giaùni, Jaùni) is a town and comune (municipality) in the Province of Sud Sardegna in Sardinia, Italy. As of 2016, 330 people lived there. Its area is 7.52 km². It is 230 meters above sea level. == References == == Other websites == Category:Communes of the Province of South Sardinia
title: Genuri
